nodes.text: Point Gold was an under-construction turbolaser battery, that was located on the planet Nizon.

When the Galactic Empire arrived on Nizon shortly after the end of the Clone Wars, they began constrution of Point Gold, which they planned to use to shoot rogue asteroids out of the sky. Vril Vrakth, a Zabrak bounty hunter traveled to Nizon in persuit of a group of Alderaanian Resistance agents and the Imperial forces allowed him to use a platfrom at Point Gold as his base of operations. During the Battle of Nizon, he lured the Resistance agents to his platform, but was defeated by them.
